damage_types.name: Acid
damage_types.description: The corrosive spray of a black dragon's breath and the dissolving enzymes secreted by a black pudding deal acid damage.

damage_types.name: Bludgeoning
damage_types.description: Blunt force attacks, falling, constriction, and the like deal bludgeoning damage.

damage_types.name: Cold
damage_types.description: The infernal chill radiating from an ice devil's spear and the frigid blast of a white dragon's breath deal cold damage.

damage_types.name: Fire
damage_types.description: Red dragons breathe fire, and many spells conjure flames to deal fire damage.

damage_types.name: Force
damage_types.description: Force is pure magical energy focused into a damaging form. Most effects that deal force damage are spells, including magic missile and spiritual weapon.

damage_types.name: Lightning
damage_types.description: A lightning bolt spell and a blue dragon's breath deal lightning damage.

damage_types.name: Necrotic
damage_types.description: Necrotic damage, dealt by certain undead and a spell such as chill touch, withers matter and even the soul.

damage_types.name: Piercing
damage_types.description: Puncturing and impaling attacks, including spears and monsters' bites, deal piercing damage.

damage_types.name: Poison
damage_types.description: Venomous stings and the toxic gas of a green dragon's breath deal poison damage.

damage_types.name: Psychic
damage_types.description: Mental abilities such as a psionic blast deal psychic damage.

damage_types.name: Radiant
damage_types.description: Radiant damage, dealt by a cleric's flame strike spell or an angel's smiting weapon, sears the flesh like fire and overloads the spirit with power.

damage_types.name: Slashing
damage_types.description: Swords, axes, and monsters' claws deal slashing damage.

damage_types.name: Thunder
damage_types.description: A concussive burst of sound, such as the effect of the thunderwave spell, deals thunder damage.
